name: Project Boost Sample
description:
This is a game that I'm developing in my process of learning to code. This is the 3rd project in the Udemy.com course "Game development & design. Learn C# using Unity Engine. Your first 3D Unity games for web, Mac & PC." By Ben Tristem with Gamedev.tv. 

Controls:

Space Bar: Fire main thruster

A - turn left

D - Turn Right

Goal: Get to the green platform without hitting anything.
